version_description:
Wondering why your Ampler bike turned the lights on by itself in the middle of the night? Surprise, surprise — we can assure you there was no ghost in your house! It was your phone’s Bluetooth which automatically connected your Ampler app with your bike.

With this latest app release, we have now added a button in the app that lets you decide whether you want to auto-connect the app with your bike or not.


No more spooky nights. We wish you a peaceful night sleep!

Wondering why your Ampler bike turned the lights on by itself in the middle of the night? Surprise, surprise — we can assure you there was no ghost in your house! It was your phone’s Bluetooth which automatically connected your Ampler app with your bike.

With this latest app release, we have now added a button in the app that lets you decide whether you want to auto-connect the app with your bike or not.


No more spooky nights. We wish you a peaceful night sleep!

The newest app release brings a lot of small improvements to the Ampler mobile app. Most importantly, Ampler app now integrates with Strava so you can follow your Ampler rides over Strava app we’ve also updated our app’s Terms & Conditions!
Happy riding!
